item.title: Bad Apple ASCII
item.description: The other day I was super bored so I decided “You know what? Fuck it I’m making something stupid.” This is the result of said stupid thing I made a small dumb program that prints the entirety of Bad Apple inside of a CMD window. Here’s the download link: EXECUTABLE A link to the code in case you want to see it. It requires .NET 6 or newer to run.
